This chart is hard to read from a distance. ACA goes into effect. We have turned healthcare into--remember the whole debate here on  subsidies on top of subsidies? When you turn healthcare into financing  instead of helping people be healthier, you have screwed up the  economics and the incentives, and we start to look at…
